#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>
using namespace std ;
int main()
{
    int t ; cin >> t ;
    while(t--){
        string str ; cin >> str ;
        int len = str.size();
        int red[len] , green[len], blue[len] ;
        for(int i=0;i<=len-1;i++){
            red[i]=1000000000;
            green[i]=1000000000;
            blue[i] = 1000000000;
        }
        // filling the red values
        int currR=1000000000;
        int currG=1000000000;
        int currB=1000000000;
        for(int i=len-1;i>=0;i--){
                red[i]=currR;
                green[i]=currG;
                blue[i]=currB;
                if(str[i]=='R'){currR=i;}
                if(str[i]=='B'){currB=i;}
                if(str[i]=='G'){currG=i;}
        }
        int realmin=len;
        for(int i=0;i<=len-1;i++){
            if(str[i]=='R'){
                    int x = max(green[i],blue[i])+1;
                    if(x-i<realmin){realmin = x-i ; }
            }
            if(str[i]=='G'){
                    int x = max(red[i],blue[i])+1;
                    if(x-i<realmin){realmin = x-i ; }
            }
            if(str[i]=='B'){
                    int x = max(green[i],red[i])+1;
                    if(x-i<realmin){realmin = x-i ; }
            }
        }
        cout << realmin << endl ;
    }
    return  0 ;
}
